data.title: Find and update company information
data.meta_description: PARALLAX (THE GOVERNESS) LIMITED - Free company information from Companies House including registered office address, filing history, accounts, annual return, officers, charges, business activity
data.text:
We use some essential cookies to make our services work.

We'd also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use our services and to make improvements.

Assets ceased/released

Part of the property or undertaking has been released from the charge

Persons entitled

British Screen Finance Limited

Amount secured

£400,000 and on behalf of british screen and £907,075 on behalf of ace due or to become due from the company to the chargee together with any further sums due to either of the chargees in connection with the film provisionally entitled "the governess" ("the film")

Short particulars

All the company's right title and interest in and to the following in relation to the film throughout the world: all literary property and ancillary rights in relation to the film, including without limitation the screenplay entitled "the governess" written by sandra goldbacher and the copyrights thereof; the entire worldwide copyright of the film. See the mortgage charge document for full details.
